creator: pankajguleria2@gmail.com
text:
Directly save a report to PDF format for aggregate reports.
View Result tree should also have a report file.

It takes lot of time for the end user to save the reports to xls format and then convert it to pdf.
More options in aggregate report listener to see the desired fields only.
For example : If i want to select only  total requests , error % , throughput , and average response time to be updated on my aggregate listener , there must be option for that. 

View results Tree is a very good listener and its reporting in the form of pdf or any other good format will be good for the end users. Because the detailed information is very good in view results tree. So this information , if documented in pdf or doc format would be beneficial.
creator: pankajguleria2@gmail.com
sebb@apache.org
text: Sorry, but this is out of scope for JMeter.
